desc: bevCacao is the juice from pulp of the cacao fruit. A tropically sweet palate party of white peaches & bananas, kissed with lychees and a spritz of lemon.

layout.text: bevCacao is the overachieving beverage squeezed from the pulp of the cacao fruit. 3x the antioxidants of pomegranate. 2x the antioxidants of the previous reigning superfruit (acai).
bevCacao tastes like the tropics after a storm. Banana, white peach, lychee – spliced with a spritz of lemon. Knock out sugar-filled sodas in a sip with the new delicious heavyweight of superfoods.
